name: DCS1_SaveOptions
shortdesc: Options for saving a document in Photoshop DCS 1.0 format.

property.name: embedColorProfile
property.shortdesc: If true, the color profile is embedded in the document.

property.name: encoding
property.shortdesc: The type of encoding to use for the document.

property.name: transferFunction
property.shortdesc: If true, includes transfer functions in the document to compensate for dot gain between the image and film.

property.name: vectorData
property.shortdesc: If true, includes vector data. Valid only if the document contains vector data (un-rasterized text).

property.name: interpolation
property.shortdesc: If true, image interpolation is used.
